app.frontend package¶

Submodules¶

app.frontend.app module¶

app.frontend.app.display_relevance_image(result, index, noise)¶

Display the relevance image.

This function displays the relevance image based on the evaluation results and allows navigation through the relevance images.

Parameters:

  • result (dict) – The evaluation results.

  • index (int) – The index of the relevance image to display.

  • noise (float) – The noise level used in the evaluation.

app.frontend.app.execute_evaluation()¶

Execute the evaluation using the prepared intermediate results.

This function sends a request to the backend to execute the evaluation and processes the response.

If the execution is successful, the results are displayed.

Raises:

HTTPException – If there is an error in the execution process.

app.frontend.app.plot_results(result)¶

Plot the evaluation results.

This function creates a bar chart to display the true values, center values, and min/max values of the evaluation results.

Parameters:

result (dict) – The evaluation results.

app.frontend.app.prepare_evaluation()¶

Prepare the evaluation by uploading the model and input image, and configuring the parameters.

This function sends a request to the backend to prepare the evaluation, including loading the model, processing the input image, and generating the zonotope.

If the preparation is successful, the session state is updated to indicate that the preparation is complete.

Raises:

HTTPException – If there is an error in the preparation process.
